alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 4:33AM EST until February 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Scattered snow showers with areas of blowing and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Strong gusty winds of 30 to 40 mph will diminish some this morning. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...From 6 PM EST /5 PM CST/ this evening to 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow resulting in snow covered roads, reduced visibility and hazardous travel conditions in open areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will diminish throughout the day decreasing the blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Open areas may be snow covered and slippery.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph
